## Load packages

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

## Load data

All the data is semi-colon separated, which we need to separate for it to be more readable

```{r}

Cancer_data <- read_csv("data.csv", col_names = TRUE, col_types = cols())
Cancer_data
```

### Clean data - more readable

```{r}
clean_cancer_data <- Cancer_data |>
  delim = ';',
```

## Running Code

When you click the **Render** button a document will be generated that includes both content and the output of embedded code. You can embed code like this:

```{r}
1 + 1
```

You can add options to executable code like this

```{r}
#| echo: false
2 * 2
```

The `echo: false` option disables the printing of code (only output is displayed).
